channel.title: What was ur best pk? *f2p and p2p*
channel.description:
its just what the topic title sez :D
ready my post at the pure poll to see my best pks on my two pures

item.title: What was ur best pk? *f2p and p2p*
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Mole Teh Mole
item.description:
@Teh_Mole wrote:

Full black, an addy mace, and 200k.
He attacked me in wildy, so me thinking -full black (On lvl 31 ranger) not bad a pk for me- so I take him into lvl 3. BLast him 8-8-8-8 and hes dead. I go to the pile, and whats this? SOme money on top? I take it. 200k Ffs. Blew it on full rune for f2p pking on main, lost within an hour (Lol)

Read full topic

item.title: What was ur best pk? *f2p and p2p*
item.dc:creator: @azn_dawg azn dawg
item.description:
@azn_dawg wrote:

Lol… Best Pk i got in f2p was actauly just yesteday lol -.-’’
i was walking around and then i saw this white dot on map
so when i ran back there was this 72 lagin lol so i kept atking him but he didnt atk back… i wonder y?probly lag…But oh well…I got full rune g-(WOAH!HE WAS SKULLED TOO!)scimmy, 2hd, bunch of lobbies and str ammy=] thats best in f2p now in p2p i got 3 dds, 12 ,d scim 9, d long, 2 ddp, 2 sets full rune, 6 glory’s and almost 100+ monk robes LOL…hmm Bes tkill i think was when i got the full dharok kill -.-
Like what kind of idiot brings full dharok? Or even any barrows armour… thats just like buying crack and not sniffing it or w.e you do

item.dc:creator: @rat_dog rat dog
item.description:
@rat_dog wrote:

Who accualy takes money into the wilderness because some one dares them? thats like telling some one to drop 5 bucks in front of a homeless man and run south…

You already know the mans probly going to pick the shit up and run…
Just like you should know some one could beat the shit out of your pixels and teleport with your cash, and they risked all that because some one said “i dare”, ffs im keeping my 5 bucks :D.

item.dc:creator: @Texasmd91 Texasmd91
item.description:
@Texasmd91 wrote:

well, this aint a single pk, but a pk trip, heres all i got

well today i went pking... i pked so much i couldnt hold it all in 1 load lool. i had to bank 3 times total...heres all i got today :)




in total:
(8)dds
(2)glory
(2)rune helm
(1)rune kite
(1)blue mystic hat
(2)archer helms
(5) black d hide bodies
(6) black d hide legs
(1) black d hide vammies
(194) rune arrows
(1) dlong
(1) warrior helm
(2) beserker helms
(1) rune chain
(3) rune legs
(1) blue mystic bottem robe
(380) water runes
(380) earth runes,
wow i got loads of cash from pking today


i looted all i got even my dhide cause i was almost bankrupted

item.source: What was ur best pk? *f2p and p2p*

item.title: What was ur best pk? *f2p and p2p*
item.dc:creator: @punisher_reg punisher reg
item.description:
@punisher_reg wrote:

members: on my rune pure i teleblocked some noob then entangled casted charge p00ned him with a sara strike mage bow spec and dds spec. the kill:d scim,glory,dhide vambs.90 rune arrows,mage bow,ancient staff,some ice burst runes(lvl 90 noob couldnt even blitz),farseer,split top,blue mystic bottom, super str pot,dds.

Then again in members i was “protecting” my friend during a lvl 3 clue he got zam kite and some oher stuff so i decided i wanted payment.
The kill: zam kite,glory,rune large,rune boots,obby cape-----i know ur thinking it im a bitch

UPDATEDI just wasted some noob at abyss he was shopping for runes so i shopped for his stuff. Gotta h8 ppl like me.
The Kill: almost 500k cash bet he hates the teleblock entangle combination along with some other stuff about now.

f2p:this was on my lvl 34 noob pker we were out in deep wildy and some lvl 4 came out and me being a bitch atk him.
The Kill:rune scimmy,green chaps and vambs,power ammy, some iron crap but still good haul off a lvl 4

This was on that same account i led some noob to 25 wildy he atked me so i binded ran back ranged him then when he ran and almost got away water blasted took that boy out.
The Kill:rune 2h,rune scimmy,power ammy,str potx2,grn dhide chaps and vambs 120 addy arrows(he killed my friend so i got both their stuff),leather chest amm of accuracy, coif
UPDATEDI just took out some loser at greaters he thought he could take me but that was his mistake.
The Kill:Full rune w/scimmy and str ammy plus some lobs but other then that nothing of value

Read full topic

item.title: What was ur best pk? *f2p and p2p*
item.dc:creator: @Daniel1234 Daniel1234
item.description:
@Daniel1234 wrote:

Well I had just started playing. I had like 200k which I thought was big and I met 2 friends my level a mage and archer. LEvel 20 wildies me and my friends 200k and my scimmy. They atak me. I am going to die. I know it. I have 1 health left and Am about to die( still in like 10 wildies)

They kept missing and I run out of food at level 3wildies. I died.

Lol. I did nt die I lived and gloated in there fat faces. I later learned they lived in my naighborhood so I beat the **** out of them. That’ll teach them.

Read full topic
